title: Majestic Six Senses Saudi Arabia Desert Escape with Five Restaurants & State-of-the-Art Spa
description: Equal parts mysterious and magnificent, immerse yourself in Saudi Arabiaâ€™s enigmatic desert beauty with a luxuriously tranquil stay at Six Senses Southern Dunes, The Red Sea. Perched on the edge of an expansive desert plane and the idyllic Hijaz Mountains, the breathtaking interiors reflect the shape, beauty and textures of the glorious dune-filled surroundings, offering comfortable yet majestic spaces for rejuvenation. With opulence at your fingertips, choose from five dining experiences to keep you refreshed and nourished throughout your stay, opt for a tailored treatment at the elevated spa, and sustainable workshops at the Earth Lab.
location_description: Six Senses Southern Dunes, The Red Sea
offer_address: The Red Sea Development, Al Dawayhi, Umluj 48321, Saudi Arabia
